00024 #define VORONOI_SIMPLEX_MAX_VERTS 5
00025 
00027 //#define BT_USE_EQUAL_VERTEX_THRESHOLD
00028 #define VORONOI_DEFAULT_EQUAL_VERTEX_THRESHOLD 0.0001f

00030 
00031 struct b3UsageBitfield{
00032         b3UsageBitfield()
00033         {
00034                 reset();
00035         }
00036 
00037         void reset()
00038         {
00039                 usedVertexA = false;
00040                 usedVertexB = false;
00041                 usedVertexC = false;
00042                 usedVertexD = false;
00043         }
00044         unsigned short usedVertexA      : 1;
00045         unsigned short usedVertexB      : 1;
00046         unsigned short usedVertexC      : 1;
00047         unsigned short usedVertexD      : 1;
00048         unsigned short unused1          : 1;
00049         unsigned short unused2          : 1;
00050         unsigned short unused3          : 1;
00051         unsigned short unused4          : 1;
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 struct  b3SubSimplexClosestResult
00056 {
00057         b3Vector3       m_closestPointOnSimplex;
00058         //MASK for m_usedVertices
00059         //stores the simplex vertex-usage, using the MASK, 
00060         // if m_usedVertices & MASK then the related vertex is used
00061         b3UsageBitfield m_usedVertices;
00062         b3Scalar        m_barycentricCoords[4];
00063         bool m_degenerate;
00064 
00065         void    reset()
00066         {
00067                 m_degenerate = false;
00068                 setBarycentricCoordinates();
00069                 m_usedVertices.reset();
00070         }
00071         bool    isValid()
00072         {
00073                 bool valid = (m_barycentricCoords[0] >= b3Scalar(0.)) &&
00074                         (m_barycentricCoords[1] >= b3Scalar(0.)) &&
00075                         (m_barycentricCoords[2] >= b3Scalar(0.)) &&
00076                         (m_barycentricCoords[3] >= b3Scalar(0.));
00077 
00078 
00079                 return valid;
00080         }
00081         void    setBarycentricCoordinates(b3Scalar a=b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar b=b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar c=b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar d=b3Scalar(0.))
00082         {
00083                 m_barycentricCoords[0] = a;
00084                 m_barycentricCoords[1] = b;
00085                 m_barycentricCoords[2] = c;
00086                 m_barycentricCoords[3] = d;
00087         }
00088 
00089 };
